title: Rabbi's Gemar Chasimah Tovah
body: Matzav.com wishes Rabbi and all families a Gemar Chasimah Tovah on Yom Kippur eve, praying for yeshuos for Klal Yisroel and a geulah in 5786.

title: Rav Meir Tzvi Bergman on Yom Kippur
body: Rav Meir Tzvi Bergman was photographed on Erev and Motzaei Yom Kippur. Photos by Shuki Lerer.

title: Chabad Travel Scam Exposed
body: Dozens of Chabad chassidim, including families, fell victim to an elaborate travel scam, paying thousands of shekels for fake tickets to visit the Rebbe, Rabbi Menachem Mendel Schneerson, during Tishrei. Many were left stranded abroad or spent Rosh Hashanah in airport terminals.

title: Rav Arzoni Leads Sefardi Rabbis in Lulav
body: Rav David Arzoni and other Gedolei HaSefardim were photographed taking the Lulav during Naanuim 5786. The event showcased the Sefardi community's traditions and customs.

title: Rav Dovid Yosef on Hostage Deal
body: Rav Dovid Yosef, the Rishon LeTzion, urged the public to daven fervently for the safe return of Israeli hostages and the eradication of Hamas during his weekly Motzaei Shabbos shiur, following renewed negotiations.
